column2: Friday News Dump: Fox Blames Meghan Markle For Prince Philip's Death And Other News
column5: This morning it was announced that Prince Philip died at the age of 99. Fox News wasted no time in implying that Meghan Markle killed him with her Oprah interview. So keep your masks on get that second (or first) shot and let's not let our guard down just yet. In the meantime music! For 16 years we have been exposing Washington lies and untangling media deceit.
